tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trials_data (
    participant_id INTEGER,
    participant_name STRING,
    age INTEGER,
    gender STRING,
    trial_id INTEGER,
    trial_name STRING,
    trial_result STRING
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT NOT NULL,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  result TEXT,
  result_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  lead_researcher VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT REFERENCES trials(trial_id),
  participant_id INT REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
  result_description TEXT,
  result_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);
